title: Field-Based Labor Union Learning Simulation: Strengthening Problem-Solving and Practical Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: A course enhancing on-site problem-solving competencies through scenarios and VR simulations based on actual labor union cases, providing an immersive learning environment using digital devices (tablets/headsets).

learning_goals: Learners can independently resolve traditional labor union issues (wage negotiations, labor condition disputes) in VR-based simulations
Learners can develop strategies to respond to complex labor environment changes (decentralization, regional autonomy) through field-based learning modules
Through team-based project submissions, learners can analyze real labor union cases and propose solutions
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
